objects.name: Collect Data from Clipboard
objects.description: The adversary exploits an application that allows for the copying of sensitive data or information by collecting information copied to the clipboard. Data copied to the clipboard can be accessed by other applications, such as malware built to exfiltrate or log clipboard contents on a periodic basis. In this way, the adversary aims to garner information to which he is unauthorized.
x_capec_prerequisites: The adversary must have a means (i.e., a pre-installed tool or background process) by which to collect data from the clipboard and store it. That is, when the target copies data to the clipboard (e.g., to paste into another application), the adversary needs some means of capturing that data in a third location.

x_capec_skills_required.High: To deploy a hidden process or malware on the system to automatically collect clipboard data.
